title: SABRE Pepper Spray - Advanced 3-In-1 Police Strength - Compact, Pink Case & Quick Release Key Ring (Max Protection - 25 shots, up to 5x's more)
description: "Making Grown Men Cry Since 1975", SABRE is the number one pepper spray used worldwide by both police and general public for personal safety.  Cool style and hot protection are combined in SABRE's most popular key chain design. This sleek, compact defense pepper spray delivers a strong ballistic stream to reduce wind blow back. Providing extremely practical protection, SABRE allows for protection at a safe distance from your threat with its ten (10) foot range, and its quick release key ring ensures its accessible when needed! Protect yourself and your loved ones with the same brand used by public safety officers worldwide! Agencies using SABRE products include the NYPD, LA County Sheriff’s Department and US Marshals.  Please Note: This item is not available to ship to certain states. Expiration Date: 4 years from date of manufacture.
